Autoprefixer.details: Sublime plugin to prefix your CSS

Better QUnit.details: A custom QUnit package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Better Rails.details: A custom Rails package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Better RSpec.details: A custom RSpec package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Better Ruby.details: A custom Ruby package, that includes snippets, custom syntax highlighters and more!

Expand Selection to Quotes.details: Sublime Text plugin to expand selection to surrounding quotes

Name That Color.details: Fetch the color name for hexdecimal RGBs from different sources.

Switch Case.details: Alternate between different cases (snake_case, SCREAM_SNAKE_CASE, CamelCase, camelBack, and hyphenate)
